department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Introduction to Distributed Computing
course.description: An examination of the special problems associated with distributed computing such as partial failure, lack of global knowledge, asynchrony and coordination of time, and protocols that function in the face of these problems. Emphasis on both the theory that grounds thinking about these systems and in the ways to design and build such systems.
course.prerequisites: Computer Science 161 or permission of instructor.
